definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink

sentences.english: It kind of short-circuits the pain.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥膏可以稍微縮短疼痛的時間。

sentences.english: eg： The nurse applied the ointment to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 護士把藥膏敷到傷口上。

sentences.english: Do not use ointments or oil dressing.
Thee cream is good for insect bites.
sentences.chinese: 這藥膏對於昆蟲蜇傷有效。

sentences.english: Apply an antibiotic ointment to the tattooed skin while it's healing.
sentences.chinese: 紋身的恢復期需要堅持塗抹抗生素藥膏，預防感染。

sentences.english: Squeeze a bit of the ointment on your eyelid every night .
sentences.chinese: 每晚往眼皮內擠一點眼藥膏。

sentences.english: I'll give you some medicine to take and some ointment to ease the itch.
sentences.chinese: 我給你開一些口服藥和一些止癢的藥膏。

sentences.english: She dabbed the ointment on the rash.
sentences.chinese: 她將藥膏輕抹在疹子上。

sentences.english: Salves are thick preparations which are infused with essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 藥膏是用精油是厚厚的籌備工作注入。

sentences.english: Put some anti-septic cream on it.
sentences.chinese: 塗上一些防止敗血症的藥膏。

sentences.english: Please put on this plaster, which can dispel wind and relieve pain.
sentences.chinese: 請貼這種藥膏，它能散風止痛。

sentences.english: Squeeze a bit of the ointment on your eyelid every night.
sentences.chinese: 每晚擠一點眼藥膏在你的眼皮裏。

sentences.english: He filled a jar with thick brown ointment that he had recently compounded.
sentences.chinese: 他給我裝了一罐新配製的濃稠的棕色藥膏。

sentences.english: You say the elder brother treat rhinitis to use be convenient to use of erythromycin eye ointment?
sentences.chinese: 哥哥你說的治鼻炎用紅黴素眼藥膏好使嗎？

sentences.english: The anti-hemorrhoidal ointment Preparation H can reduce gout-induced skin swelling temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 一種治療痔的藥膏處方能夠暫時減輕痛風的疼痛。

sentences.english: This ointment can work in your skin.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥膏能滲入你的皮膚。

definition: herbal plaster applied to a wound
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
